front.title: TWAMP Light Extensions for Segment Routing Networks

abstract.t: Segment Routing (SR) leverages the source routing paradigm. SR is applicable to both Multiprotocol Label Switching (SR-MPLS) and IPv6 (SRv6) data planes. This document describes RFC 5357 (Two-Way Active Measurement Protocol (TWAMP) Light) extensions for Delay and Loss Measurement in Segment Routing networks, for both SR-MPLS and SRv6 data planes.
